department.ch: 認知神經科學研究所碩士班

goal.ch: 透過課程中不同主題之演講、報告、討論及交流，提升對於該議題的了解與執行研究的能力，培養學生獨立完成專題與簡報的能力
goal.en: I hope students can learn various topics on neuroscience and exprimental psychology, and to know how to do the neuroscience and exprimental psychology study, eg. paper collection and review, expriment progaming writing, expriment running, data analysis and presentation etc.

outline.ch: 邀請外部專家學者分享專業知識，並安排學生於課程中簡報，磨練進行專題研究和簡報的能力。
outline.en: Invite external experts and scholars to share their professional knowledge, and arrange for students to give presentations in the course to hone their ability to conduct special research and presentations.
